feed.title: Deakin Infomation Security Club | Sessions
feed.subtitle: A university club for hackers, problem solvers and IT security professionals.

entry.title: 0x03: Infosec in the real world
entry.content:
IUSEC had the privilege of hosting two special guest speakers, Matt Dunwoodie and Lukasz Gogolkiewicz from Context, at our Week 7 club session this past week.

Matt and Lukasz were candid about their journey through the industry, gave insight into how to successfully navigate our way towards a job, and detailed the realities of the #cyber industry.

Thank you Matt and Lukasz for taking the time to come and visit us on-campus!
entry.summary: IUSEC had the privilege of hosting two special guest speakers, Matt Dunwoodie and Lukasz Gogolkiewicz from Context, at our Week 7 club session this past week.

entry.title: IUSEC_18_Tri2_Week10: Introduction to Binary Exploitation
entry.content:
Viren Khatri from Deloitte’s Cyber Risk Advisory Practice comes to IUSEC to do a workshop on writing buffer overflow exploits in 32-bit applications from scratch.

The pastebin link from the intro to this video to get the resources for the activity is: here.
entry.summary: Viren Khatri from Deloitte’s Cyber Risk Advisory Practice comes to IUSEC to do a workshop on writing buffer overflow exploits in 32-bit applications from scratch.

entry.title: IUSEC_18_Tri2_Week6: Life of a Pentester
entry.content: T0py talks about the different kinds of work and tools that pentesters use in their day-to-day work (and a couple of “war stories”).
entry.summary: T0py talks about the different kinds of work and tools that pentesters use in their day-to-day work (and a couple of “war stories”).

entry.title: IUSEC_18_Tri2_Week5: Careers in CyberSecurity
entry.content:
In this session Nigel Hedges, a Senior Security Architect, talks to us about:

  • Journeys into IT Security careers.
  • Soft skills vs. technical skills, and what is wrong with that sentence.
  • The Pros and Cons of IT Security certifications.
  • Outline all of the different career paths in IT Security.
entry.summary: In this session Nigel Hedges, a Senior Security Architect, talks to us about:

entry.title: IUSEC_18_Tri2_Week4: Relay attacks & Powershell Empire
entry.content:
Chris and Aaron run through the basics of relay attacks, and how to use Powershell Empire for post-exploitation.

Slides are here.
entry.summary: Chris and Aaron run through the basics of relay attacks, and how to use Powershell Empire for post-exploitation.

entry.title: IUSEC_18_Tri1_Week5: Intro to Exploitation
entry.content:
This week we briefly go over the various steps during exploitation, and some things to keep in mind during post-exploitation. It’s assumed you a familiar with conducting your own reconnaissance and enumeration.

Slides are here.
entry.summary: This week we briefly go over the various steps during exploitation, and some things to keep in mind during post-exploitation. It’s assumed you a familiar with conducting your own reconnaissance and enumeration.
